byline.contributor: Rukmini Callimachi contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Islamic State claims responsibility for machete attack in Charleroi, Belgium, that severely wounded two police officers.

headline.print_headline: ISIS Claims It Was Behind Machete Attack in Belgium
headline.main: Islamic State Claims Responsibility for Belgium Machete Attack

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The group issued a statement saying the attacker, who wounded two police officers before being fatally shot, was its “soldier.”...
lead_paragraph: The group issued a statement saying the attacker, who wounded two police officers before being fatally shot, was its “soldier.”
